intro: Cnestis grandifoliolata, commonly known as the large-leaf cnestis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are small and clustered, typically white or pale yellow, and it produces small, round berries. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ease of cultivation.
